thread.section_title: Technology - Internet Related Businesses For Sale in Canada
thread.title: Outsourced & Hosted Technology Services

title: Outsourced & Hosted Technology Services
text: Questions Business Summary Well established technology company for sale offering a diversified set of services, including cloud hosted services, custom web and application development, on-site and remote technical support, as well as IT staffing services. Stable customer base, with long term contracts with recurring monthly billing representing over 50% of total revenue. Well trained, highly skilled staff. Well established company culture, with very low staff turn over rates. Sale includes all server infrastructure used to host client services, as well as proprietary operations and billing software, and well documented operating procedures and staff training material. Seller training and transition available. Seller financing available. This is a very profitable and successful business growing organically with no marketing and advertising. Excellent growth potential with a disciplined business development process. Financials
